channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-27623|2024-08-03T05:33:00.648Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Missing authentication for critical function vulnerability in iSCSI management functionality in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 7.1-42661 allows remote attackers to read or write arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-22686|2024-08-03T03:21:49.057Z -- synology -- synology%20calendar
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in webapi component in Synology Calendar before 2.3.4-0631 allows remote authenticated users to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27622|2024-08-03T05:32:59.979Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Package Center functionality in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 7.1-42661 allows remote authenticated users to access intranet resources via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27626|2024-08-03T05:32:59.212Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: A vulnerability regarding concurrent execution using shared resource with improper synchronization ('Race Condition') is found in the session processing functionality of Out-of-Band (OOB) Management. This allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) versions before 7.1.1-42962-2 may be affected: DS3622xs+, FS3410, and HD6500.

item.title: CVE-2022-43749|2024-08-03T13:40:06.461Z -- synology -- presto%20file%20server
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in summary report management in Synology Presto File Server before 2.1.2-1601 allows remote authenticated users to bypass security constraint via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27618|2024-08-03T05:32:59.297Z -- synology -- storage%20analyzer
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in webapi component in Synology Storage Analyzer before 2.1.0-0390 allows remote authenticated users to delete arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27613|2024-08-03T05:32:59.205Z -- synology -- carddav%20server
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an SQL command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in webapi component in Synology CardDAV Server before 6.0.10-0153 allows remote authenticated users to inject SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-3576|2024-08-03T01:14:02.548Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: A vulnerability regarding out-of-bounds read is found in the session processing functionality of Out-of-Band (OOB) Management. This allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) versions before 7.1.1-42962-2 may be affected: DS3622xs+, FS3410, and HD6500.

item.title: CVE-2022-27612|2024-08-03T05:32:59.706Z -- synology -- audio%20station
item.description: Buffer copy without checking size of input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in cgi component in Synology Audio Station before 6.5.4-3367 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27614|2024-08-03T05:32:59.398Z -- synology -- media%20server
item.description: Exposure of sensitive information to an unauthorized actor vulnerability in web server in Synology Media Server before 1.8.1-2876 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27621|2024-08-03T05:32:59.388Z -- synology -- usb%20copy
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in webapi component in Synology USB Copy before 2.2.0-1086 allows remote authenticated users to read or write arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-22683|2024-08-03T03:21:48.996Z -- synology -- media%20server
item.description: Buffer copy without checking size of input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in cgi component in Synology Media Server before 1.8.1-2876 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27616|2024-08-03T05:33:00.475Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability in webapi component in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 7.0.1-42218-3 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-22685|2024-08-03T03:21:48.885Z -- synology -- webdav%20server
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in webapi component in Synology WebDAV Server before 2.4.0-0062 allows remote authenticated users to delete arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27624|2024-08-03T05:32:59.875Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: A vulnerability regarding improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer is found in the packet decryption functionality of Out-of-Band (OOB) Management. This allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) versions before 7.1.1-42962-2 may be affected: DS3622xs+, FS3410, and HD6500.

item.title: CVE-2022-27625|2024-08-03T05:32:59.822Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: A vulnerability regarding improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer is found in the message processing functionality of Out-of-Band (OOB) Management. This allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) versions before 7.1.1-42962-2 may be affected: DS3622xs+, FS3410, and HD6500.

item.title: CVE-2022-27619|2024-08-03T05:32:59.950Z -- synology -- synology%20note%20station%20client
item.description: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information vulnerability in authentication management in Synology Note Station Client before 2.2.2-609 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-22684|2024-08-03T03:21:48.988Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability in task management component in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.4-25553 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-22688|2024-08-03T03:21:48.973Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in a command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in File service functionality in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.4-25556-2 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-22681|2024-08-03T03:21:48.758Z -- synology -- photo%20station
item.description: Session fixation vulnerability in access control management in Synology Photo Station before 6.8.16-3506 allows remote attackers to bypass security constraint via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27620|2024-08-03T05:32:59.935Z -- synology -- sso%20server
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in webapi component in Synology SSO Server before 2.2.3-0331 allows remote authenticated users to read arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-43931|2024-08-03T13:40:06.582Z -- synology -- vpn%20plus%20server
item.description: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability in Remote Desktop Functionality in Synology VPN Plus Server before 1.4.3-0534 and 1.4.4-0635 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27617|2024-08-03T05:32:59.273Z -- synology -- synology%20calendar
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in webapi component in Synology Calendar before 2.3.4-0631 allows remote authenticated users to download arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-22682|2024-08-03T03:21:49.154Z -- synology -- synology%20calendar
item.description: Improper neutralization of input during web page generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Event Management in Synology Calendar before 2.4.5-10930 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27615|2024-08-03T05:32:59.223Z -- synology -- dns%20server
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in cgi component in Synology DNS Server before 2.2.2-5027 allows remote authenticated users to delete arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-22680|2024-08-03T03:21:48.840Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Exposure of sensitive information to an unauthorized actor vulnerability in Web Server in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 7.0.1-42218-2 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-43932|2024-08-03T13:40:06.866Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements in output used by a downstream component ('Injection') vulnerability in CGI component in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-6 and 1.3.1-9346-3 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-43748|2024-08-03T13:40:06.455Z -- synology -- presto%20file%20server
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in file operation management in Synology Presto File Server before 2.1.2-1601 allows remote attackers to write arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-22679|2024-08-03T03:21:48.985Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in support service management in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 7.0.1-42218-2 allows remote authenticated users to write arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-22687|2024-08-03T03:21:49.112Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Buffer copy without checking size of input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in Authentication functionality in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.3-25426-3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27611|2024-08-03T05:32:59.334Z -- synology -- audio%20station
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in webapi component in Synology Audio Station before 6.5.4-3367 allows remote authenticated users to delete arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-27610|2024-08-03T05:32:59.274Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in webapi component in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.3-25423 allows remote authenticated users to delete arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2023-47802|2024-08-02T21:16:43.691Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command ('OS Command Injection') is found in the IP block functionality. This allows remote authenticated users with administrator privileges to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.title: CVE-2023-47803|2024-08-02T21:16:43.667Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') is found in the Language Settings functionality. This allows remote attackers to read specific files containing non-sensitive information via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.description: Missing authorization vulnerability in GetStmUrlPath webapi component in Synology Surveillance Station before 9.2.0-9289 and 9.2.0-11289 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.

item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an SQL command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Emap.Delete webapi component in Synology Surveillance Station before 9.2.0-9289 and 9.2.0-11289 allows remote authenticated users to inject SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

item.description: Missing authorization vulnerability in GetLiveViewPath webapi component in Synology Surveillance Station before 9.2.0-9289 and 9.2.0-11289 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.

item.description: Missing authorization vulnerability in System webapi component in Synology Surveillance Station before 9.2.0-9289 and 9.2.0-11289 allows remote authenticated users to bypass security constraints via unspecified vectors.

item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an SQL command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Layout.LayoutSave webapi component in Synology Surveillance Station before 9.2.0-9289 and 9.2.0-11289 allows remote authenticated users to inject SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

item.description: Improper validation of array index vulnerability in UserPrivilege.Enum webapi component in Synology Surveillance Station before 9.2.0-9289 and 9.2.0-11289 allows remote authenticated users to bypass security constraints via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-5463|2024-08-01T21:11:12.729Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding buffer copy without checking the size of input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') has been found in the login component. This allows remote attackers to conduct denial-of-service attacks via unspecified vectors. This attack only affects the login service which will automatically restart. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.1.1-0383 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.title: CVE-2023-47802|2024-07-30T17:25:07.479Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command ('OS Command Injection') is found in the IP block functionality. item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an SQL command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in ActionRule.Delete webapi component in Synology Surveillance Station before 9.2.0-11289 and 9.2.0-9289 allows remote authenticated users to inject SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39352|2024-07-02T19:27:16.374Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding incorrect authorization is found in the firmware upgrade functionality. This allows remote authenticated users with administrator privileges to bypass firmware integrity check via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.title: CVE-2024-39351|2024-06-28T14:13:43.888Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware

item.title: CVE-2024-39350|2024-06-28T14:09:08.119Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding authentication bypass by spoofing is found in the RTSP functionality. item.title: CVE-2024-39349|2024-06-28T06:03:59.624Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding buffer copy without checking size of input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') is found in the libjansson component and it does not affect the upstream library. This allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.description: A vulnerability regarding incorrect authorization is found in the firmware upgrade functionality. item.description: A vulnerability regarding authentication bypass by spoofing is found in the RTSP functionality. item.title: CVE-2023-47802|2024-06-28T06:01:58.733Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command ('OS Command Injection') is found in the IP block functionality. This allows remote authenticated users with administrator privileges to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.description: A vulnerability regarding improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') is found in the Language Settings functionality. This allows remote attackers to read specific files containing non-sensitive information via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.
